issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A fix has been committed, and will be part of the next release
status.name: Release Pending

fields.description:
Snapshots can be stored in s3 so that they can be shared between availability zones. If the snapshot bucket is deleted then deletion of snapshots will get stuck on the failure to remove the snapshot object from s3:

{code}
Thu Jan 12 13:01:12 2017  WARN [S3SnapshotTransfer:eucalyptus-storage-checkerthreadpool-worker-293] Failed to delete snapshot from objectstorage: snapshotId=snap-53df4820, bucket=snapshots-4ac046f3539b4a16a0efbe0c20b98661, key=snap-53df4820
Thu Jan 12 13:01:12 2017  WARN [SnapshotDeleter:eucalyptus-storage-checkerthreadpool-worker-293] Failed to delete snapshot snap-53df4820 from ObjectStorageGateway
com.eucalyptus.blockstorage.exceptions.SnapshotTransferException: Failed to delete snapshot from objectstorage: snapshotId=snap-53df4820, bucket=snapshots-4ac046f3539b4a16a0efbe0c20b98661, key=snap-53df4820
Thu Jan 12 13:01:42 2017  WARN [S3SnapshotTransfer:eucalyptus-storage-checkerthreadpool-worker-293] Failed to delete snapshot from objectstorage: snapshotId=snap-53df4820, bucket=snapshots-4ac046f3539b4a16a0efbe0c20b98661, key=snap-53df4820
Thu Jan 12 13:01:42 2017  WARN [SnapshotDeleter:eucalyptus-storage-checkerthreadpool-worker-293] Failed to delete snapshot snap-53df4820 from ObjectStorageGateway
com.eucalyptus.blockstorage.exceptions.SnapshotTransferException: Failed to delete snapshot from objectstorage: snapshotId=snap-53df4820, bucket=snapshots-4ac046f3539b4a16a0efbe0c20b98661, key=snap-53df4820
Thu Jan 12 13:02:13 2017  WARN [S3SnapshotTransfer:eucalyptus-storage-checkerthreadpool-worker-293] Failed to delete snapshot from objectstorage: snapshotId=snap-53df4820, bucket=snapshots-4ac046f3539b4a16a0efbe0c20b98661, key=snap-53df4820
Thu Jan 12 13:02:13 2017  WARN [SnapshotDeleter:eucalyptus-storage-checkerthreadpool-worker-293] Failed to delete snapshot snap-53df4820 from ObjectStorageGateway
com.eucalyptus.blockstorage.exceptions.SnapshotTransferException: Failed to delete snapshot from objectstorage: snapshotId=snap-53df4820, bucket=snapshots-4ac046f3539b4a16a0efbe0c20b98661, key=snap-53df4820
Thu Jan 12 13:02:43 2017  WARN [S3SnapshotTransfer:eucalyptus-storage-checkerthreadpool-worker-293] Failed to delete snapshot from objectstorage: snapshotId=snap-53df4820, bucket=snapshots-4ac046f3539b4a16a0efbe0c20b98661, key=snap-53df4820
Thu Jan 12 13:02:43 2017  WARN [SnapshotDeleter:eucalyptus-storage-checkerthreadpool-worker-293] Failed to delete snapshot snap-53df4820 from ObjectStorageGateway
com.eucalyptus.blockstorage.exceptions.SnapshotTransferException: Failed to delete snapshot from objectstorage: snapshotId=snap-53df4820, bucket=snapshots-4ac046f3539b4a16a0efbe0c20b98661, key=snap-53df4820
Thu Jan 12 13:03:14 2017  WARN [S3SnapshotTransfer:eucalyptus-storage-checkerthreadpool-worker-293] Failed to delete snapshot from objectstorage: snapshotId=snap-53df4820, bucket=snapshots-4ac046f3539b4a16a0efbe0c20b98661, key=snap-53df4820
Thu Jan 12 13:03:14 2017  WARN [SnapshotDeleter:eucalyptus-storage-checkerthreadpool-worker-293] Failed to delete snapshot snap-53df4820 from ObjectStorageGateway
com.eucalyptus.blockstorage.exceptions.SnapshotTransferException: Failed to delete snapshot from objectstorage: snapshotId=snap-53df4820, bucket=snapshots-4ac046f3539b4a16a0efbe0c20b98661, key=snap-53df4820
Thu Jan 12 13:03:44 2017  WARN [S3SnapshotTransfer:eucalyptus-storage-checkerthreadpool-worker-293] Failed to delete snapshot from objectstorage: snapshotId=snap-53df4820, bucket=snapshots-4ac046f3539b4a16a0efbe0c20b98661, key=snap-53df4820

Thu Jan 12 13:04:15 2017  WARN [S3SnapshotTransfer:eucalyptus-storage-checkerthreadpool-worker-293] Failed to delete snapshot from objectstorage: snapshotId=snap-53df4820, bucket=snapshots-4ac046f3539b4a16a0efbe0c20b98661, key=snap-53df4820
Thu Jan 12 13:04:15 2017  WARN [SnapshotDeleter:eucalyptus-storage-checkerthreadpool-worker-293] Failed to delete snapshot snap-53df4820 from ObjectStorageGateway

Thu Jan 12 13:04:45 2017  WARN [S3SnapshotTransfer:eucalyptus-storage-checkerthreadpool-worker-293] Failed to delete snapshot from objectstorage: snapshotId=snap-53df4820, bucket=snapshots-4ac046f3539b4a16a0efbe0c20b98661, key=snap-53df4820

Thu Jan 12 13:05:45 2017  WARN [S3SnapshotTransfer:eucalyptus-storage-checkerthreadpool-worker-293] Failed to delete snapshot from objectstorage: snapshotId=snap-53df4820, bucket=snapshots-4ac046f3539b4a16a0efbe0c20b98661, key=snap-53df4820
Thu Jan 12 13:05:45 2017  WARN [SnapshotDeleter:eucalyptus-storage-checkerthreadpool-worker-293] Failed to delete snapshot snap-53df4820 from ObjectStorageGateway
com.eucalyptus.blockstorage.exceptions.SnapshotTransferException: Failed to delete snapshot from objectstorage: snapshotId=snap-53df4820, bucket=snapshots-4ac046f3539b4a16a0efbe0c20b98661, key=snap-53df4820
{code}

the detail for this exception is:

{code}
Thu Jan 12 13:09:19 2017  WARN [S3SnapshotTransfer:eucalyptus-storage-checkerthreadpool-worker-293] Failed to delete snapshot from objectstorage: snapshotId=snap-53df4820, bucket=snapshots-4ac046f3539b4a16a0efbe0c20b98661, key=snap-53df4820
Thu Jan 12 13:09:19 2017  WARN [SnapshotDeleter:eucalyptus-storage-checkerthreadpool-worker-293] Failed to delete snapshot snap-53df4820 from ObjectStorageGateway
com.eucalyptus.blockstorage.exceptions.SnapshotTransferException: Failed to delete snapshot from objectstorage: snapshotId=snap-53df4820, bucket=snapshots-4ac046f3539b4a16a0efbe0c20b98661, key=snap-53df4820
        at com.eucalyptus.blockstorage.S3SnapshotTransfer.delete(S3SnapshotTransfer.java:617)
        at com.eucalyptus.blockstorage.async.SnapshotDeleter.deleteSnapFromOSG(SnapshotDeleter.java:271)
        at com.eucalyptus.blockstorage.async.SnapshotDeleter.deleteFromOSG(SnapshotDeleter.java:216)
        at com.eucalyptus.blockstorage.async.SnapshotDeleter.run(SnapshotDeleter.java:119)
        at java.util.concurrent.Executors$RunnableAdapter.call(Executors.java:511)
        at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.runAndReset(FutureTask.java:308)
        at java.util.concurrent.ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor$ScheduledFutureTask.access$301(ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor.java:180)
        at java.util.concurrent.ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor$ScheduledFutureTask.run(ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor.java:294)
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1142)
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:617)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745)
Caused by: com.eucalyptus.blockstorage.exceptions.SnapshotTransferException: Snapshot transfer operation failed because of
        at com.eucalyptus.blockstorage.S3SnapshotTransfer.retryAfterRefresh(S3SnapshotTransfer.java:967)
        at com.eucalyptus.blockstorage.S3SnapshotTransfer.delete(S3SnapshotTransfer.java:605)
        ... 10 more
Caused by: com.amazonaws.services.s3.model.AmazonS3Exception: Status Code: 404, AWS Service: Amazon S3, AWS Request ID: fbec2de1-e41d-452b-acb9-3f8747387066, AWS Error Code: NoSuchBucket, AWS Error Message: The specified bucket does not exist., S3 Extended Request ID: null
        at com.amazonaws.http.AmazonHttpClient.handleErrorResponse(AmazonHttpClient.java:773)
        at com.amazonaws.http.AmazonHttpClient.executeHelper(AmazonHttpClient.java:417)
        at com.amazonaws.http.AmazonHttpClient.execute(AmazonHttpClient.java:229)
        at com.amazonaws.services.s3.AmazonS3Client.invoke(AmazonS3Client.java:3384)
        at com.amazonaws.services.s3.AmazonS3Client.deleteObject(AmazonS3Client.java:1683)
        at com.eucalyptus.objectstorage.client.EucaS3Client.deleteObject(EucaS3Client.groovy:109)
        at com.eucalyptus.blockstorage.S3SnapshotTransfer$1.apply(S3SnapshotTransfer.java:611)
        at com.eucalyptus.blockstorage.S3SnapshotTransfer$1.apply(S3SnapshotTransfer.java:605)
        at com.eucalyptus.blockstorage.S3SnapshotTransfer.retryAfterRefresh(S3SnapshotTransfer.java:958)
        ... 11 more
{code}

Deleting the object from s3 but leaving the bucket in place does not cause this issue, it is only when the bucket is deleted. 

If the bucket is recreated then snapshot deletion will then succeed.

We may want to track the number of deletion attempts and fail after some limit or fail after trying to delete for some period of time (but note that the state deletedfromebs does not necessarily mean deletion from s3 should be performed)
fields.summary: Snapshot deletion from s3 attempts should be limited

comments.body:
Added timeout of 2 days if snapshot deletion from OSG fails, still trying every 30 seconds. After the 2 days, it gives up and never tries again for that snapshot. In the future, we can make the 2 days configurable.

See PR https://github.com/eucalyptus/eucalyptus/pull/102

Tested using timeout changed to two minutes. Now testing with the official timeout of 2 days. If it passes by Sunday night, I'll commit the changes then.
Tested by changing timeout RETRY_MAX_MILLIS to two minutes.
